00150     class connection_equal {
00151     public:
00153         connection_equal(const NBConnection& c) : myC(c) {}
00154 
00155         bool operator()(const NBConnection& c) const {
00156             return c.getFrom() == myC.getFrom() && c.getTo() == myC.getTo() &&
00157                    c.getFromLane() == myC.getFromLane() && c.getToLane() == myC.getToLane();
00158         }
